title: In Vitro System
description: Schema for submitting a sample grown in a in vitro system.

passage_number.comment: Only in vitro system with classification as a cell line are allowed to have passage_number property.

classification.comment: If an in vitro system is of classification organoid, differentiated cell specimen, or reprogrammed cell specimen then targeted_sample_term, introduced_factors, time_post_factors_introduction, and time_post_factors_introduction_units are required.

classification.title: Classification
classification.description: The general category of this type of in vitro system.
classification.comment: Required property. The specified category should match the ontology type used to describe this type of in vitro system. For example 'brain organoid' uses UBERON ontology, cell lines use CL ontology, etc. Differentiated, reprogrammed, and pooled cell specimen are in concordance with NCIT definitions.

time_post_factors_introduction.title: Time Post Factors Introduction
time_post_factors_introduction.description: The time that elapsed past the time-point when the factors were introduced.
time_post_factors_introduction.comment: Use in conjunction with time_post_factors_introduction_units to specify time elapsed post factors introduction. Use of this property requires time_post_factors_introduction_units specification.

time_post_factors_introduction_units.title: Time Post Factors Introduction Units
time_post_factors_introduction_units.description: The units of time that elapsed past the point when the factors were introduced.
time_post_factors_introduction_units.comment: Use in conjunction with time_post_factors_introduction to specify time elapsed post factors introduction. Use of this property requires time_post_factors_introduction specification.

introduced_factors.title: Introduced Factors
introduced_factors.description: A list of treatments applied to the biosample with the purpose of differentiation or reprogramming.

items.title: Treatment
items.description: A treatment applied to the biosample.

originated_from.title: Originated From
originated_from.description: The biosample this in vitro system sample was originated from.

passage_number.title: Passage Number
passage_number.description: Number of passages including the passages from the source.
passage_number.comment: In calculating passage number, include passages from the source. Use of this property requires classification to be a cell line.

targeted_sample_term.title: Targeted Sample Term
targeted_sample_term.description: Ontology term identifying the targeted endpoint biosample resulting from differentation or reprogramming.
